overview: A short film about 2 young ladies Michelle and Keisha coming to term with their sexuality, and their love for each other. The pressure begins to take its toll as they try to hide their relationship from everyone including Michelle's parents Jack and Shirley, who believe that love should be between a man and a woman. Things come to a boil when Michelle's mom begins to suspect that Michelle and Keisha are more than just friends.
title: Don't Judge Our Love
